main event: A UFO sighting reported on January 26, 1952, over Rochester, New York.
interesting points: Witness reported seeing a circular disc hovering at about 50-75 feet above the ground,The object appeared to rotate on its own axis, and it had a steady, non-blinking light,There were no wings, tail, or other structures visible on the object,The witness claimed to have had many previous sightings of similar objects,This sighting lasted approximately 3-5 minutes.
witness description: The witness has had many sightings of such objects over the past several years.
